title: ‘Invisible heater leak left me with £34k water bill I can’t afford to pay’
text:
Has a company treated you unfairly? Our consumer champion, Katie Morley, is here to help. For how to contact her click here.

Dear Katie,

I run a micro business of three people from a 500 sq ft office, for which the water bill is usually £18 a month. In February our supplier, Castle Water, billed us for £43,435. It subsequently reduced the amount to £34,055.

After a lengthy investigation, it was established that the increased usage was due to a silent and invisible leak inside a small water heater in our office sometime in 2017.

Castle Water had readings showing abnormal water use and yet carried on billing us for £18 a month until earlier this year. Had Castle Water provided us with accurate...
description: Has a company treated you unfairly?
